attribute_definition_groups.name: Vimeo Video Properties
attribute_definition_groups.description: The properties used to configure the display of the linked Vimeo video.  Please specify the videoId as well as the layout dimensions for this video.

attribute_definitions.name: Vimeo Video ID
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the Vimeo ID of the video being linked (can be retrieved via the Vimeo video's url).

attribute_definitions.name: Enable Autoplay
attribute_definitions.description: Check to ensure the video starts automatically

attribute_definitions.name: Display controls on video
attribute_definitions.description: Check if you would like to have a start/pause button on the video

attribute_definitions.name: Mute Audio
attribute_definitions.description: Check this box if you would like sound disabled during playing

attribute_definition_groups.name: Video Overlay Buttons
attribute_definition_groups.description: You can specify up to 3 buttons and links with color and position

attribute_definitions.name: Overlay Alignment
attribute_definitions.description: Where would you like the buttons and links to appear?

attribute_definitions.name: Text Color
attribute_definitions.description: Color of the button text and border
